title: Wigneswaran pushes forward West’s Re- Colonizing game plan in calling for re-write of Sri Lanka’s History
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – It has become a key political and imperial strategy of the West intent on de–stabilizing and breaking up Sri Lanka to attribute all ills of this country to the majority Sinhala Buddhists and vilify the ‘Mahavamsa’ the ancient Historical Chronicle (originally written in the 5th Century by Mahanama Mahathera) as…
